## ResourceComputationType enum

Way the memory consumption of a tile is computed. Either in number of tiles, or in MegaBytes. If it is in MB, an estimation is used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ResourceComputationType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  EstimationInMb | <code>0</code> |  |
|  NumberOfTiles | <code>1</code> |  |
